CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: dragonsbreath
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with lots of tiny prometheum shards that spread in a broad pattern, setting anything in its Path on fire!

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: flechette
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Lots of tiny steel darts that have lots of armor piercing potential.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: shrapnel
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: One-piece projectile, stuffed to capacity with shrapnel and powder.
